titleStmt.title: A match at mid-night A pleasant comœdie: as it hath beene acted by the Children of the Revells. Written by VV.R.
titleStmt.author: Rowley, William, 1585?-1642?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Mathewes, for William Sheares, and are to be sold at his shop in Brittaines Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
